climbs.name: Pumpty Dumpty
climbs.fa: HT with BG. Ffa HT 10/18/21 with EH

content.description: Short and fierce on exceptional rock with an incredible hang and views of Black Elk Peak.Pull onto a good edge from stacked cheater stones. Surprisingly big holds ascending a gentle incline will deliver a dumpty pump into the great fall zone. Keep it together or risk all the kings horses and all the kings men.The bottom and hardest climbing is very well protected culminating to a significant runout with ground fall potential in 11+ terrain before easing considerably towards the anchor.All day sun in the summer. Good window of mid-day sun during the colder months, but also blocked by Vertigo and Outer Outlet at times.
content.protection: 4 bolts. Bolted anchor. Stick Clip. Attentive belay
content.location: South face of Midlife Mound. Scramble up gully on SE side of Old Peoples Dome to great hang.

content.description: An egg like sub-formation between Old People’s Dome and Young Peoples Dome
